languages.text: "Слова создания, чьей волей правит сиюминутная прихоть. Ты не способ{mf|ен|на} дать мне ни единой причины верить в стойкость твоих убеждений".

traits.locale_text: "Слова создания, чьей волей правит сиюминутная прихоть. Мы не способ{mf|ен|на} дать мне ни единой причины верить в стойкость твоих убеждений".

languages.text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."
languages.original_text: "Слова создания, чьей волей правит сиюминутная прихоть. Ты не способ{mf|ен|на} дать мне ни единой причины верить в стойкость твоих убеждений".

traits.locale_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."
"The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."
"The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."
"The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

languages.text: “不过是心血来潮的生物一时兴起说出来的话。你没办法让我相信，你的信念真的有什么力量。”
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: “不过是心血来潮的生物一时兴起说出来的话。你没办法让我相信，你的信念真的有什么力量。”

languages.text: 「生物が発する言葉は瞬間瞬間の思いつきに支配されている。お前が何をしようと、そこに強い信念があるとは思えぬ」
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: 「生物が発する言葉は瞬間瞬間の思いつきに支配されている。お前が何をしようと、そこに強い信念があるとは思えぬ」

languages.text: "Die Worte einer Kreatur, deren Willen von plötzlichen Launen gesteuert wird. Es gibt nichts, was Ihr tun könntet, damit ich an die Festigkeit Eurer Überzeugungen glaube."
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: "Die Worte einer Kreatur, deren Willen von plötzlichen Launen gesteuert wird. Es gibt nichts, was Ihr tun könntet, damit ich an die Festigkeit Eurer Überzeugungen glaube."

languages.text: « Les paroles d'une créature dont la volonté est régie par des lubies passagères. Il n'y a rien que vous puissiez faire pour me convaincre de la force de vos convictions. »
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: « Les paroles d'une créature dont la volonté est régie par des lubies passagères. Il n'y a rien que vous puissiez faire pour me convaincre de la force de vos convictions. »

languages.text: «Las palabras de una criatura cuya voluntad está atada a impulsos momentáneos. No hay nada que puedas hacer para convencerme de la firmeza de tus convicciones».
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: «Las palabras de una criatura cuya voluntad está atada a impulsos momentáneos. No hay nada que puedas hacer para convencerme de la firmeza de tus convicciones».

languages.text: "İradesi, anlık kaprislere bağlı olan bir yaratığın sözleri bunlar. Ne yaparsan yap, sözünün samimiyetine beni inandıramazsın."
languages.original_text: "The words of a creature whose will is ruled by momentary whims. There is nothing you can do to make me believe in the strength of your convictions."

traits.locale_text: "İradesi, anlık kaprislere bağlı olan bir yaratığın sözleri bunlar. Ne yaparsan yap, sözünün samimiyetine beni inandıramazsın."
